title: Table theme options
jupyter: python3

```{python}
from great_tables import GT, exibble

(GT(exibble)
    .tab_header("The title", "A subtitle")
    .tab_options(
        heading_background_color = "lightgreen",
        stub_background_color="purple",
        row_group_background_color="blue",
        table_background_color="orange",
        source_notes_background_color="yellow",
        column_labels_background_color="red"
    )
)
```
